# Nokia 7750 SR OS MPLS Configuration

configure
    router "Base"
        mpls
            admin-state enable
            interface "to-peer-1"
                admin-state enable
            exit
            interface "to-peer-2"
                admin-state enable
            exit
            path "to-pe2"
                admin-state enable
                hop 1 192.168.1.2 strict
            exit
            lsp "to-PE-Router-2"
                admin-state enable
                to 10.10.10.101
                path-computation-method local-cspf
                primary "to-pe2"
                exit
            exit
        exit
        rsvp
            admin-state enable
            interface "to-peer-1"
                admin-state enable
            exit
            interface "to-peer-2"
                admin-state enable
            exit
        exit
        ldp
            admin-state enable
            interface-parameters
                interface "to-peer-1"
                exit
                interface "to-peer-2"
                exit
            exit
            targeted-session
                peer 10.10.10.101
                exit
            exit
        exit
    exit
    port 1/1/1
        admin-state enable
        description "MPLS Core Link 1"
        ethernet
            mode network
            mtu 9212
        exit
    exit
    port 1/1/2
        admin-state enable
        description "MPLS Core Link 2"
        ethernet
            mode network
            mtu 9212
        exit
    exit
exit
